main: ^Mi Dios, Ephraim! Why are you here?
^Oh, w-well, Beth brought me! Working with Manifest wasn't bad for a while, but...
^It just got worse and worse, Maria. I couldn't do anything. I didn't want to s-stay, but I couldn't leave either.
^Not until Beth helped me, anyway. She's so strong, Maria! It was incredible. Most of us would s-still be there if it weren't for her.
^I am... glad to hear it, Ephraim. I did not expect to see you. I will have to thank Beth for bringing you here.
^Of course! I think you'll like her, Maria. She reminds me a lot of you.
^Is that right? Well, she is already putting me to work. Maybe that will earn her trust.
^W-work? What, are y-you leaving? You just got here!
^Someone has to, Ephraim. We need to figure out what is happening, put a stop to it.
^But that doesn't have to be y-you, does it? You - you can stay!
^I cannot. I apologize. But I promise I will return.
^Okay, Maria. I guess I'll wait here.
